title: IRefPlaneFeatureData.OriginOnCurve
description: Gets or sets whether to place the origin on the curve for this reference plane feature.
returns: True to place the origin on the curve, false to place the origin on the vertex or point
remarks:
IMPORTANT:
Reference planes created in SOLIDWORKS 2010 or later are constraint based; reference planes created in SOLIDWORKS 2009 or earlier are not. See the
Remarks
section in the
IRefPlaneFeatureData interface
topic for details about reference planes and this interface.
